client

Class DBConnect

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.DBConnect

  • public class DBConnect
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts to handle all database related queries, actions, and executions that may need to occur. Uses standard JDBC Driver and imports the LauncherUI class from the userInterface package.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Jonathan Novins

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.sql.Connection ghCon
      Global Connection variable; Only necessary Connection throughout the application
      private java.sql.ResultSet ghRs
      Global ResultSet Object used to retrieve the required information from the JDBC Statement
      private java.sql.Statement ghStmt
      Global Statement Object used to send queries/insert/update etc through the Connection Driver

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DBConnect()
      This constructs a DBConnect Object that will act to execute any database related methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createAccount(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Database related method that will attempt to create an account using a received username and password
      boolean isTaken(java.lang.String username)
      Database related method for DBConnect that will check if a given username is already occipied in the connected database.
      boolean login(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      A database related method that attempts to login to an existing account using the received credentials

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBConnect

    • Method Detail

      • createAccount

        public void createAccount(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Database related method that will attempt to create an account using a received username and password
        Parameters:
        username - - the requested username that the user would like to use for their account. Will throw an error if username is not checked for isTaken()
        password - - the desired password that the user would like associated with their account.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown if INSERT statement causes a database error (such as a taken username being sent)

      • isTaken

        public boolean isTaken(java.lang.String username)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Database related method for DBConnect that will check if a given username is already occipied in the connected database.
        Parameters:
        username - A String for the username to be tested in the currently active Connection to a DB
        Returns:
        A boolean value relating to the status of isTaken(); Returns true if username is already taken and false if username is not already taken
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown if query execute causes a database error

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        A database related method that attempts to login to an existing account using the received credentials
        Parameters:
        username - - the name of the account of which the login attempt will be acting upon
        password - - the believed associated password to the account with name username
        Returns:
        Returns boolean value in regards to the success of the login attempt; Returns true if login is successful, returns false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown if an error occurs from the database's end of the query execution
